summary: P7.2 Admin MDM UI Testing - All 3 screens (AdminAttributes, AdminOptions, AdminVehicleMDM) working correctly. Login, navigation, inline editing, search, filters, drill-down navigation all functional. RBAC enforcement verified via API.

minor.issue: fuel_type and other vehicle-related select attributes have no seeded options - UI shows 0 options. Only shopping-related attributes (condition_shopping, brand_electronics) have options seeded.

issues: Missing TR/DE labels for options - only EN values populated. Shows '-' for TR/DE columns.

action_items: Seed attribute options for vehicle-related select attributes (fuel_type, gear_type, body_type, etc.) if they should have options
Add multi-language labels (TR, DE) to existing attribute options if needed
Create a country_admin test user if RBAC UI testing is required
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
RBAC correctly implemented - moderator blocked from MDM, only super_admin/country_admin allowed
Inline edit pattern with save/cancel buttons works well
Breadcrumb navigation for drill-down flows properly implemented
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Existing data: 37 attributes, 40 attribute_options (shopping only), 10 vehicle makes, 27+ models
context_for_next_testing_agent: P7.2 MDM Admin UI fully functional. Tested: AdminAttributes (list/search/filter/inline-edit), AdminOptions (breadcrumb/list/edit), AdminVehicleMDM (makes list/edit/toggle/drill-to-models/models edit). RBAC verified via API. No country_admin user exists for full RBAC UI testing.
